meanings.definition: The quality or state of being in the past.
meanings.sent1: The pastnesses of history books help us understand our ancestors.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy reflecting on the pastnesses of my childhood.
meanings.sent3: The pastnesses of old photographs always bring a smile to my face.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes held a deep pastnesses, like windows to another time.
meanings.sent5: The pastnesses of ancient ruins transport you to a different era.

meanings.definition: Instances or occurrences from the past.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed various pastnesses from different time periods.
meanings.sent2: Studying the pastnesses of wars can teach us valuable lessons.
meanings.sent3: Grandma's attic is a treasure trove of pastnesses waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent4: The pastnesses of forgotten traditions linger in the air of the old village.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the pastnesses of civilizations reveals the evolution of humanity.
